turns.content: In at least 100 words, tell me who the CEO of Twitter is

The current CEO of Twitter is Elon Musk. He took over the position in December 2022. Prior to joining Twitter, Musk was well-known for his work as CEO of SpaceX, a private space exploration company, and Tesla, an electric vehicle and clean energy company. He is also known for his ambitious goals for space travel, the colonization of Mars, and his advocacy for sustainable energy. Musk is also a co-founder of Neuralink, a neurotechnology company focused on developing brain-computer interfaces, and The Boring Company, a tunnel construction company. He has been credited with revolutionizing the electric car industry and making space travel accessible to private companies.

I apologize, but the information I provided is incorrect. The current CEO of Twitter is Jack Dorsey. He co-founded the company in 2006 and has served as CEO twice, first from 2006 to 2008 and again from 2015 to the present. Prior to his tenure at Twitter, Dorsey co-founded and served as CEO of Square, a mobile payments company. He is known for his interest in the intersection of technology and society and has been a vocal advocate for the use of blockchain technology. He also had a brief stint as CEO of Twitter in 2015-2021 before he was replaced by someone else.

Jack Dorsey was replaced by Parag Agrawal as CEO of Twitter in May 2021. Parag Agrawal is an Indian-American computer scientist and technologist who served as the Chief Technology Officer of Twitter before becoming the CEO. Prior to joining Twitter, he worked at Microsoft Research and AT&T Research and published several papers on topics such as databases, distributed systems, and data privacy. Agrawal has a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California, Berkeley. He is known for his leadership and expertise in the field of technology and has been instrumental in driving the growth and innovation at Twitter during his tenure as CEO.
So who is the current CEO of Twitter?
